Columns.Description: Details of source system of the object being provisioned
Columns.Name: SourceSystem

Columns.Description: The date and time of the event in UTC
Columns.Name: TimeGenerated

Columns.Description: For sign-ins, this value is always Sign-in activity
Columns.Name: OperationName

Columns.Description: The REST API version that's requested by the client
Columns.Name: OperationVersion

Columns.Description: Category of the sign-in event
Columns.Name: Category

Columns.Description: The result of the sign-in operation can be Success or Failure
Columns.Name: ResultType

Columns.Description: Contains the error code, if any, for the sign-in operation
Columns.Name: ResultSignature

Columns.Description: Provides the error description for the sign-in operation
Columns.Name: ResultDescription

Columns.Description: The duration of the operation in milliseconds
Columns.Name: DurationMs

Columns.Description: ID to provide sign-in trail
Columns.Name: CorrelationId

Columns.Description: Resource group for the logs
Columns.Name: ResourceGroup

Columns.Description: The identity from the token that was presented when you made the request. It can be a user account, system account, or service principal
Columns.Name: Identity

Columns.Description: The severity level of the event
Columns.Name: Level

Columns.Description: The region of the resource emitting the event
Columns.Name: Location

Columns.Description: Provides the on-premises UPN of the user sign-ing into Azure AD.e.g. Phone number sign-in
Columns.Name: AlternateSignInName

Columns.Description: App name displayed in the Azure portal
Columns.Name: AppDisplayName

Columns.Description: Unique GUID representing the app ID in the Azure Active Directory
Columns.Name: AppId

Columns.Description: A record of each step of authentication undertaken in the sign-in
Columns.Name: AuthenticationDetails

Columns.Description: List of authentication methods used
Columns.Name: AuthenticationMethodsUsed

Columns.Description: Provides the details associated with authentication processor
Columns.Name: AuthenticationProcessingDetails

Columns.Description: Type of authentication required for the sign-in.  If set to multiFactorAuthentication, an MFA step was required.  If set to singleFactorAuthentication, no MFA was required
Columns.Name: AuthenticationRequirement

Columns.Description: Set of CA policies that apply to this sign-in, each as CA: policy name, and/or MFA: Per-user
Columns.Name: AuthenticationRequirementPolicies

Columns.Description: Details outlining app auth used (Legacy vs non Legacy) Eg: Modern Browser, Native App, Exchange Activty Sync and Older Clients
Columns.Name: ClientAppUsed

Columns.Description: Details of the conditional access policies being applied for the sign-in
Columns.Name: ConditionalAccessPolicies

Columns.Description: Status of all the conditionalAccess policies related to the sign-in
Columns.Name: ConditionalAccessStatus

Columns.Description: Datetime of the sign-in activity
Columns.Name: CreatedDateTime

Columns.Description: Details of the device used for the sign-in
Columns.Name: DeviceDetail

Columns.Description: Indicates if a sign-in is interactive or not
Columns.Name: IsInteractive

Columns.Description: Unique ID representing the sign-in activity
Columns.Name: Id

Columns.Description: IP address of the client used to sign in
Columns.Name: IPAddress

Columns.Description: Indicates if a sign-in is considered risky or not
Columns.Name: IsRisky

Columns.Description: Details of the sign-in location
Columns.Name: LocationDetails

Columns.Description: Details of the Multi-factor authentication
Columns.Name: MfaDetail

Columns.Description: Provides the details associated with authentication processor
Columns.Name: NetworkLocationDetails

Columns.Description: The request id of the first request in the authentication sequence
Columns.Name: OriginalRequestId

Columns.Description: Request processing time in milliseconds in AD STS
Columns.Name: ProcessingTimeInMs

Columns.Description: Name of the resource that the user signed into
Columns.Name: ResourceDisplayName

Columns.Description: ID of the resource that the user signed into
Columns.Name: ResourceIdentity

Columns.Description: The resource tenantId for B2B(business-to-business) scenarios
Columns.Name: ResourceTenantId

Columns.Description: Risky user state details
Columns.Name: RiskDetail

Columns.Description: The list of risk event types associated with the sign-in
Columns.Name: RiskEventTypes

Columns.Description: The list of risk event types associated with the sign-in. These are strings
Columns.Name: RiskEventTypes_V2

Columns.Description: Aggregated risk level
Columns.Name: RiskLevelAggregated

Columns.Description: Risk level during sign-in
Columns.Name: RiskLevelDuringSignIn

Columns.Description: Risky user state
Columns.Name: RiskState

Columns.Description: The types that are associated with the sign-in.  Examples include "interactive", "refreshToken", "managedIdentity", "continuousAccessEvaluation" and many more
Columns.Name: SignInEventTypes

Columns.Description: Details of the sign-in status
Columns.Name: Status

Columns.Description: Name of the identity provider (e.g. sts.microsoft.com )
Columns.Name: TokenIssuerName

Columns.Description: Type of identityProvider (Azure AD, AD Federation Services)
Columns.Name: TokenIssuerType

Columns.Description: User Agent for the sign-in
Columns.Name: UserAgent

Columns.Description: Display name of the user that initiated the sign-in
Columns.Name: UserDisplayName

Columns.Description: ID of the user that initiated the sign-in
Columns.Name: UserId

Columns.Description: User principal name of the user that initiated the sign-in
Columns.Name: UserPrincipalName

Columns.Description: The name of the table
Columns.Name: Type
